title: mOhana mukham
sahitya:
mOhana mukham kaNDEn en ANDavan mullai muruval viNDEnE sakhiyE


anupallavi

  UghamAi en Ashai dAhamAi vENDiya Eka nAyakan yOga bhOga nAyakan emmAn


caraNam    aruNa kiraNam pOl karuNao oLi vIsum anbut-tirumukhamE
azhagiLam ezhil enrum amudam pOl vazhindiDum Anandat-tEn mukhamE
iruvinai oppuDan malaparibhAgamum IndiDum shAnta mukham IndiDa 
IndiDak-kAntam pOl Irtennai iraNdarak-kalandiDum paranda aruL suranda
